name: emacs lsp-bridge typescript language server
description: emacs lsp-bridge typescript language server environment installed by Nix Pacakge Manager

multiUser.description: Perform a multi-user install (instead of single user)

packages.description: Optinal additional comma separated list of Nix packages to install in profile besides default language server pacakge.

useAttrPath.description: Enable this option to use exact attribute path of the package in the Nixpkgs repository, aligning with the nix-env -iA command.

flakeUri.description: Optional URI to a Nix Flake to install in profile.

extraNixConfig.description: Optional comma separated list of extra lines to add to /etc/nix/nix.conf.
